name: Art Research & Theatre Society (ARTS)

address: Sarnal Bala Kp Road Anantnag Kashmir

briefDescription: ARTS we are working in the field of art research and theatre  we have 150 students from different schools and collages under training in different professional activities like acting for television, theatrical performances and for documentary film making we have well trained staff for coaching and training purpose we work on the concept that our society and country should be clean and clear in every respect .....thanks
